properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NM FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_CD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DT, MEMBER_NICK FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS')CREATE_DT, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPLY_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_NO =? ORDER BY REPLY_NO
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_ST = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_ST = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO =?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
